description:
This course prepares students with fundamental knowledge of using R, a powerful complete analytical environment, to organize, visualize, and analyze data. It is, however, not a programming course. It will focus on case studies from the most commonly used tasks that a business analyst will face on a day-to-day basis and how R could be used to handle such cases. 

The topics covered in the course include foundations of R programming, data visualization, regression-based data modelling, classification, and social media analysis.
title: Business Analytics with R
